prontera,147,159,6	script	Robes	4_M_FAIRYSCHOLAR_DIRTY,{
	
switch(select("Robes 0-60", "Robes 60-120", "Robes 120-180"))
{
	case 1: callshop "robes1",1; break;
	case 2: callshop "robes2",1; break;
	case 3: callshop "robes3",1; break;
}
end;

}

/*

// Uncomment if you just wish to try robes. Do not use on production server.
prontera,155,180,5	script	sfdfsdf	89,{

switch(select("First 60", "Second 60", "Third 60"))
{
	case 1: callsub Sub_Robes_give, 0, 60; break;
	case 2: callsub Sub_Robes_give, 60, 120; break;
	case 3: callsub Sub_Robes_give, 120, 160; break;
}
end;

Sub_Robes_give:
	
	.@j = getarg(0);
	.@upto = getarg(1);

	for( .@tmp = 0; .@j < .@upto; .@j++)
		getitem .robes[.@j], 1;

	return;
	end;


OnInit:
	setarray .robes[0],64300,64301,64302,64303,64304,64305,64306,64307,64308,64309,64310,64311,64312,64313,64314,64315,64316,64317,64318,64319,64320,64321,64322,64323,64324,64325,64326,64327,64328,64329,64330,64331,64332,64333,64334,64335,64336,64337,64338,64339,64340,64341,64342,64343,64344,64345,64346,64347,64348,64349,64350,64351,64352,64353,64354,64355,64356,64357,64358,64359,64360,64361,64362,64363,64364,64365,64366,64367,64368,64369,64370,64371,64372,64373,64374,64375,64376,64377,64378,64379,64380,64381,64382,64383,64384,64385,64386,64387,64388,64389,64390,64391,64392,64393,64394,64395,64396,64397,64398,64399,64400,64401,64402,64403,64404,64405,64406,64407,64408,64409,64410,64411,64412,64413,64414,64415,64416,64417,64418,64419,64420,64421,64422,64423,64424,64425,64426,64427,64428,64429,64430,64431,64432,64433,64434,64435,64436,64437,64438,64439,64440,64441,64442,64443,64444,64445,64446,64447,64448,64449,64450,64451,64452,64453,64454,64455,64456,64457,64458,64459,64460,64461,64462,64463,64464,64465,64466,64467,64468;
	end;
}
